title: [QUESTION] SKTypeface.FromStream in MAUI
body:
Hi 
I am porting a Xamarin app to Maui.
Today we do it like this in Xamarin. 
```
var assembly = IntrospectionExtensions.GetTypeInfo(typeof(SkiaSharpHelper)).Assembly;
Stream stream =assembly.GetManifestResourceStream("LiberoClub.Resources.Fonts.babyplanetregular.otf");
_babyPlanetRegular = SKTypeface.FromStream(stream);
```

but this is not working when the font files are of type MauiFont in the projectfile.
```
<!-- Fonts -->
<MauiFont Include="Resources\Fonts\*" /> 
```

So to get this to work I need to add this line for every font in the project. 
```
<ItemGroup>
	  <EmbeddedResource Include="Resources\Fonts\babyplanetregular.otf" />   
</ItemGroup>
```

Is there some way to do this where I don't need to manual add the font twice.

//Thanks Joacim
